creator: trawick@apache.org
text: It does work on at least Solaris 10 and OpenSolaris; no clue here about earlier releases, nor how to provide the necessary details for Solaris.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text: Actually ldaps with Solaris LDAP seems to segfault for folks that try it, so I guess it is just as well that the doc says it isn't supported until some fixes are in place.
